sections.obtaining: Enter [[A BFDI]]'s Area. After that, go to the back of the building, you should be teleported to the "RAAAAHHHHH" building. If you look near the door, you should see '''Fax Machine''' there.

[[File:YoylelandRealm.png|2000px]]
{{CharacterInfo |name=Fax Machine |character=[[File:Fax Machine.png]] |difficulty=[[File:Strenuous.png|link=]] '''Strenuous''' |area=[[Yoyleland]] |hint=start in a bfdi's area |additionalinfo }} == Info == facts. It is a machine... == Obtaining == '''''The following text will show instructions on how to get this object. If you wish to find it by yourself, avoid opening the text.'''''
Enter [[A BFDI]]'s Area. After that, go to the back of the building, you should be teleported to the "RAAAAHHHHH" building. If you look near the door, you should see '''Fax Machine''' there.
